product.title: Metropolitan Iron & Cool Grey Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
product.description: The perfect finishing touch for a contemporary space, this stunning blind features some truly modern touches. relproducts.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholmfabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last.
